donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
outputs.output_descr: Syria is a low prevalence HIV/AID; but there are risk of outbreak of HIV/AIDS  among MARPs Groups and in the lack of any accurate information concerning the behavioural of such groups the project will focus on two major issues: HSS: Information System Strengthening Surveillance and Research on MARPs Groups and Supporting Legal and Policy Environment

project_descr: Strengthening HIV prevention among most-at-risk populations (MARPs) in the Syrian Arab Republic
